entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as being anxious about the possibility of being expelled.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend and classmate of Harry's, who is also a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as having gone with Hedwig.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hermione's owl, which she calls down from the wardrobe.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are together in the same room, with Harry pretending to rummage through his trunk while Hermione calls Hedwig down from the wardrobe.
Harry is aware of Hedwig's presence in the room, as he hears her being called down by Hermione and later sees that she has gone.
Hermione leaves the room with Hedwig, leaving Harry behind.
